nodes.text: Inrider Squadron was a squadron of five T-wings. They were launched from an old Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser  which was escorting a group of three BFF-1 bulk freighters Furlo carrying munitions intended for Zaarin, to engage loyalist Imperial forces, led by Tan Maarek Stele. However, they along with Outrider Squadron and the Dreadnaught were destroyed in the battle.
